title: Google Pixel 2 stuck on reboot white screen.HELP!
content:
Power button for 1000 restarts

Power button plus volume down which leads to a sick little robot(Device state locked).I press(tried start but did not work) recovery mode, no command appears (and a smaller robot). Again I press power button plus volume down, another screen appears I  press reboot system now, and nothing happens, back to a frozen screen. I don't want to lose my data. HELP
